# after(_:)

**Type Method**

The system removes the Live Activity that ended at the specified time within a four-hour window.

## Declaration

```swift
static func after(_ date: Date) -> ActivityUIDismissalPolicy
```

## Parameters

- **date**: A date within a four-hour window from the moment the Live Activity ends.

## Discussion

Provide a date to tell the system when it should remove a Live Activity that ended. While you can provide any date, the system removes a Live Activity that ended after the specified date or after four hours from the moment the Live Activity ended — whichever comes first. When the system removes the Live Activity,  the [doc://com.apple.activitykit/documentation/ActivityKit/ActivityState] changes to [doc://com.apple.activitykit/documentation/ActivityKit/ActivityState/dismissed].

## Dismissing a Live Activity

- **default**: The system’s default dismissal policy for the Live Activity.
- **immediate**: The system immediately removes the Live Activity that ended.
